text: Create a blog and name it portfolio with a new blogtemplate and blog listing.

Dear HubSpot-devs: Can I use a  landingpage-emplate from the old template builder and use it in a new theme, so the content doesn't have to be added again? Does anybody have any experience with that? I'd be happy to hear from you.

Thank you <@UH7EQK06T>
Is this method still valid? <https://www.stephanieogaygarcia.com/HubSpot-website-development/adding-custom-fields-to-HubSpot-blog-posts>
Good question. I'm having the same issue with a landingpage. How did you proceed with the blog?
